lead_paragraph: When a health care provider’s cost is higher than the insurance company’s rate, patients can receive an invoice for the difference: the dreaded “balance billing.”
snippet: When a health care provider’s cost is higher than the insurance company’s rate, patients can receive an invoice for the difference: the dreaded “balance billing.”

headline.main: How to Avoid, or Dispute, Surprise Medical Bills
headline.seo: Surprise Medical Bills Can Be Avoided With Negotiation
headline.print_headline: How to Avoid, or Dispute, Surprise Medical Bills
